headline: Managing Director at  CTAP | One-Stop-Shop for SME Funding

experiences.company: CTAP | Your One-Stop Shop for Funding for R&D, Game Development, Film & TV Production
experiences.title: Managing Director
experiences.description: CTAP team is dedicated to guiding clients through the complex funding landscape, providing strategic advice and tailored solutions that help them secure essential funding. Whether youâ€™re developing groundbreaking technology, creating immersive gaming experiences, or launching transformative products, we are here to support your journey to success. Partner with CTAP and gain a trusted advisor who is committed to helping you achieve your strategic goals.

experiences.title: Co-Founder
experiences.description: MediaFunds (mediafunds.ca) , a registered division  of CTAP Inc., specializes in helping interactive digital media developers, and film  and television producers throughout Canada to take advantage of provincial and federal incentive programs. Our services include planning, preparing, supporting, and auditing tax credit submissions. Many of Canada's game developers, AR/VR developers, and Film and TV producers depend on CTAP and MediaFunds to apply for grants and tax credits while they focus on their productions.

experiences.title: Member
experiences.description: York Angels provides a supportive linkage between local entrepreneurs, seeking early and mid-stage capital, and investors with a commitment to the economic development of the Region and to the entrepreneurial spirit of their community. We are committed to providing quality investment support and coaching to qualifying companies, thereby ensuring they have the best opportunity for growth and expansion in their industry.
